about_the_game:
In "A Dino Date" you play as a lonely velociraptor who is on the prowl for love! Craft and harvest items, inspect and decipher dating blogposts to find clues about your romantic interests, and answer the dialogue choices correctly in order to win them over.

You must keep track of your energy meter because, as we all know, finding love is absolutely exhausting and can tire you out fast! In the event that exhaustion overtakes you, head over to the nest and catch a few Zs.

Once your dates start to arrive, you will be battling against a clock in order to win them over! You will be expected to cook and otherwise create things that woo them.
detailed_description:
In "A Dino Date" you play as a lonely velociraptor who is on the prowl for love! Craft and harvest items, inspect and decipher dating blogposts to find clues about your romantic interests, and answer the dialogue choices correctly in order to win them over.

You must keep track of your energy meter because, as we all know, finding love is absolutely exhausting and can tire you out fast! In the event that exhaustion overtakes you, head over to the nest and catch a few Zs.

Once your dates start to arrive, you will be battling against a clock in order to win them over! You will be expected to cook and otherwise create things that woo them.
name: A Dino Date

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: A game where you play as a velociraptor finding love. You are expected to craft, harvest, and create items using a variety of methods. Players must have a keen eye and be willing to monitor stats such as their health and energy - finding love is hard work!
